creator: ABA Bank Ltd. (Cambodia)
descriptionHtml:
PayWay Mobile is free to use mPOS solution for any sized businesses including an individual entrepreneurs who has an account with ABA Bank. Your business can be a cafe, phone shop, beauty salon, delivery service or any other business. You just need to download the app, activate with your ABA account and you are ready to start accepting payments from your customers.

KEY ADVANTAGES

Go cashless

PayWay Mobile allows accepting payments by presenting universal QR code that works for ABA PAY, Visa QR and Mastercard QR payments. Your customers can simply scan your QR code and pay from their ABA account or card via ABA Mobile app or with banking applications. You will get money directly in your ABA bank account.

With cashless payment, no need to worry about small note change or about being infected with viruses or germs through cash.

Real time monitoring

With PayWay Mobile, you can monitor all your transactions in real time and see the summary of your daily sales volume in a glance. Moreover, you can track sales from multiple sales-points and cashiers. All transaction statistics can also be downloaded in the form of reports for accounting needs and analysis.

Manage your sales-points and cashiers

You can create one or multiple sales-points and add dedicated cashiers under each sales-point.

Security first

PayWay Mobile is developed with highest security by following industry standards. Your personal information is well protected and transaction data is securely encrypted.
descriptionShort: Your business companion for receiving cashless payment.

appDetails.developerAddress: 148, Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh, 12321, Cambodia
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Activate PayWay Mobile with your ABA account with ease
- Start accepting cashless payments via ABA PAY, VISA QR and Mastercard QR
- Get payment notification instantly
- Monitor your every transaction in real time
- Perform same day full refund
- Download sales report for selected period
- Create and manage one or multiple sales points
- Manage cashiers under dedicated sales points

With cashless payment, no need to worry about small note change or about being infected with viruses or germs through cash.

Real time monitoring

With ABA Merchant, you can monitor all your transactions in real time and see the summary of your daily sales volume in a glance. Moreover, you can track sales from multiple sales-points and cashiers. All transaction statistics can also be downloaded in the form of reports for accounting needs and analysis.

Manage your sales-points and cashiers

You can create one or multiple sales-points and add dedicated cashiers under each sales-point.

Security first

ABA Merchant is developed with highest security by following industry standards. Your personal information is well protected and transaction data is securely encrypted.
descriptionShort: Your business companion for receiving cashless payment.
